code: import React from"react";import{useNavigate}from"react-router-dom";import"./recipeCard.css";import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const RecipeCard=_ref=>{let{id,title,url,image,key}=_ref;let navigate=useNavigate();const onRecipeClick=()=>{navigate("/view/".concat(id,"/").concat(title.replace(' ','-')));};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"recipe-card",onClick:onRecipeClick,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{className:"recipe-card-image",src:image}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"recipe-card-title",children:title}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"recipe-card-url",children:url})]},key);};export default RecipeCard;
